Title: Space Rabbit
Writer: Douglas Adams (based upon the novels by), Max Landis (created for television by), Max Landis, Sinead Daly (executive story editor), Molly Nussbaum (story editor)
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Fiona Dourif
Plot: Todd and Farah are searching for Dirk while still being on the run. Bart's searches for Ken in Montana, where unusual events are taking place.
